alert.note: Alert for Northern El Paso County Including Monument and Black Forest; Teller County, Rampart Range Including Pikes Peak and Florissant Fossil Beds National Monument (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 01 at 8:27PM MDT until April 02 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 10 PM MDT SUNDAY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 221 AND 226... ...RED FLAG WARNING FOR THIS EVENING HAS EXPIRED... * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 221 and 226. * Winds...West 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 7 percent. * Impacts...Conditions will be favorable for rapid rates of fire growth and spread.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Northern El Paso County Including Monument and Black Forest; Teller County, Rampart Range Including Pikes Peak and Florissant Fossil Beds National Monument
